roleset.name: unhealthy

example.name: arg 0 as disease
example.text: The liver is diseased with cirrhosis.

example.name: Arg 1 with 2 things should (and often are not) be tagged as ADV
example.text: Bilateral hypogastric arteries were diffusely diseased with areas of stenosis.

roleset.note: DISEASED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharpe data. Slight comparison to infect.01. Infect.01 is a member of VN class fill-9.8. Framed by Katie. (from diseased.01-j)
